website_summaries.verdict: Add some country-style charm to your home with this lovely two-toned, painted wood dining table.
pros: White painted legs and a neutral, wood-toned surface
Measures 45 inches by 28 inches by 29 inches make it suitable for smaller rooms
cons: Top has been known to have splinters, requiring a bit of sanding

website_summaries.verdict: Sturdy two-tone table with planked effect on top.
pros: Smaller table perfect for apartments or tight spaces
cons: Some reported that the table gave off a chemical smell

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: I have never before seen such great packaging or such easy to follow instructions. Even the hardware was packaged great. Instead of it all being thrown in a bag, it was actually blister packed. Each type in a separate place, easy to see, count and access. Besides that, the table is solid and well made. There are a few flaws in the wood on the top, but that just adds to the "farmhouse" feel and look. And I, a 79 year old lady, put it together, easily, by myself in a matter of minutes.
customer_reviews.author: jb

customer_reviews.title: Small, cute, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Cute little table. It is exactly as described and pictured in description. I have a very small kitchen/dining area, so this was perfect for us as a family of 4. Be aware, you definitely won't be able to squeeze more than 4 people at this table though. Assembly was easy and quick. We have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: WifeMomNurse

customer_reviews.title: Rustic and easy to put together...
customer_reviews.text: This table is right for two or three people. I loved it wasn't finished just because it adds more to the rustic vibe it has. It's super super easy to build. It also arrived in perfect conditions. I'm giving it 4 stars just because I'm not sure if the legs of the table are as steady as I've would like them to be... It looks lovely on the dining room...
customer_reviews.author: Ana Eleonor

customer_reviews.title: Cute table! Good price!
customer_reviews.text: Cute little table and I think it's a good buy. For the cost, this table is definitely worth it. I needed something to fit in a small dining area of my living/dining space. This fits perfectly and looks better than the bigger table I had there before. The quality is decent for what you pay.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda K

customer_reviews.title: We love this table
customer_reviews.text: We love this table. It was easy to put together and is very sturdy. We have a large family, and I bought this for my little ones to eat at. I was a little concerned about the top not wiping clean very easily. However, this is not a problem at all. It is extremely easy to clean, even with the crevices. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: I don't write many reviews unless the item is very good or very bad. This table exceeded my very picky nature. It's fit and finish were excellent. Its is easy to put together and an overall great value!
customer_reviews.author: Chris B.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Great Value!!
customer_reviews.text: This table came in great shape. It was packed well. In fact, the styrofoam was covered in plastic wrap so there were no pesky bits all over the house. All I had to do was put the legs on. They even sent a ratchet-type Allen wrench which made it incredibly easy to secure the legs to the top. Someone had posted that the top was unfinished. That was not true for the table I received. The finish was perfect! This is a great quality table. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: ~pcy

customer_reviews.title: VERY Impressed!!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write reviews but this product deserves it. I don't think I've ever seen a product packaged as well as this table was packaged. Even to the point were the Foam packing was encased in plastic wrap so as not to get that white foam all over the place. The table was extremely easy to put together. Less than 5 minutes. AND they included an actual ratchet along with the allen wrench. That was impressive and sped up the process. VERY WELL DONE!!!! I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Jones

customer_reviews.title: 6 Stars!
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars for the product and 1 extra star for the packaging. As I'm known to remove a star for packaging, it's only fair I add one when appropriate. Wrapped styrofoam eliminated tiny pieces going everywhere. So that was my first impression. Second impression was the product itself. Absolutely beautiful and sturdy. Third impression was putting it together. Super easy. Lastly, some thoughtful additions...the thank you card, extra parts just in case, and the tiny ratchet in addition to the Allen wrench. Oh, and the price was great too. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Adirondack customer

customer_reviews.title: A gorgeous table!
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to put together. It was packaged great.... no dings, dents or nicks. It comes in a big box, so be sure you have an open space to put it together comfortably. It's sturdy and sleek. I will say the pic appears cream color and other reviews mentioned cream in color .. the base on mine is white. And that's a plus since I just purchased white chairs. I wasn't all that concerned about the color. I needed it to fit a certain area, which it does .. but the white color was a plus. The top is sooo pretty. It suits me nicely! A big 5 stars from me ♥
customer_reviews.author: Amy Feulner

customer_reviews.title: Not wobbly and wood top is laminated
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I need; The exact size. Installed the legs; not one bit of wobble. For the price, I had expected a thin wood table top with spindly legs. Not at all. The top is thin but heavy. The legs are lightweight but thick and sturdy. Packed carefully by a company that seems to care very much about its customer service. The wood has been finished so that it seems to be washable. Love everything about it. Just attach the legs; nothing complicated. Also the wood tabletop is laminated. Not to worry about wood absorbing spills. The legs and trim on mine are white. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline T. Moulder

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: This table represents great value for money. I ordered it for my laundry room, and it fits perfectly. The legs were quick and simple to attach. This product comes with clear instructions, and the necessary nuts and bolts are blister-packed and enclosed in their own box. Also enclosed was a delightful little set of greeting notecards as a thank you for the purchase. This manufacturer’s attention to detail is very good. I can recommend this product without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Helen M. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Intentionally rough top surface, not smooth
customer_reviews.text: The top wood surface was made to look "rustic," with a pitted appearance. The advantage is if you do get scratches eventually on the tabletop, no one will notice!! The price went up $65 after I purchased it! It appears to me that they decided this was a well made, positively reviewed product, and decided they could charge more. Much more!! The table is heavy for its size, defintely not a lightweight! Appears to be to be solid wood.
customer_reviews.author: craigery

customer_reviews.title: Well Exceeds Expectations
customer_reviews.text: My table was delivered today, and it exceeds my expectations. As noted in other reviews, the packaging alone was impressive. Even the foam was wrapped in plastic so I didn't have to vacuum those tiny foam balls that stick to everything. The table is solid wood. The grooves on top noted int the images are routed to give the appearance of a plank table, but the top is solid and well constructed. The legs are white, which is what i hoped for. If you're looking for a small well-built table, this one will not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Miller

customer_reviews.title: A little defective but cute table
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, sturdy little table. Mine had some apparent “defects”. I bought from Amazon open box, which was supposed to be a New product still but I really wonder if previous buyer returned for same reason. Large grooves down table. I had no way to get this back to amazon (due to weight, they have always been very amazing with the few problems I have ever had so just decided to keep) it still very cute . Just looks VERY Rustic
customer_reviews.author: Mattymack

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, perfect rustic touches
customer_reviews.text: What a spectacular table! It was packaged extremely well. Easy to assemble and even came with a hand Alan wrench ratchet tool ( I will keep forever). This company clearly cares about the quality of their product and the customer who will have this staple piece of furniture in their home. I wish I needed more tables to continue to support this awesome company! I got the Becky two tone. Wood top with white trim (under) and legs.
customer_reviews.author: HDUB43

customer_reviews.title: Rough finish on table top
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this table, but ended up returning it. Overall the table was cute and very nicely packaged. It was very easy to put together. The finish on the table top was rough in spots...mostly wherever there were knots in the wood. The size was a bit small for my husband's liking. If four people are sitting around the table with plates, there pretty much is no room left to have anything else on the table. The main thing I did like was the color of the table. It matched perfectly with my oak chairs I already had...hard to find that color oak any more in furniture.
customer_reviews.author: N. Dini

customer_reviews.title: Well-made, gorgeous product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item to use as a desk since I am working from home. I absolutely love it! It's sturdy, easy to assemble, and very pleasing to look at. It shipped and was received in just a few days. It came with all the necessary nuts and bolts to attach the legs and even a blank thank you stationary card, which was sent by the seller so you could send someone a note--a nice surprise I thought. I would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Love

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: What a pleasant surprise. Needed a small table for assisted living. I'd give it 10 stars! The quality and durability was outstanding. It took 5 minutes to assemble and came with a really high end tool to do it. Couldn't be more pleased. It is perfect and really appreciate the quality. The packaging was heavy duty and it's hard to believe the low cost. It was worth triple the cost. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Love this table! I was having a hard time finding something for my breakfast nook. Needed something short for the built in bench and not too long so it wasn't in the way of the pantry. This table was perfect. So easy to assemble I did it myself in 20 minutes and that includes unpacking the box and clean up! Note on my picture, I stained the top so it is not the true color
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Very solid table
customer_reviews.text: We bought a bench and the matching table from this company and they're both really solid. Little details, like how all the packing styrofoam is wrapped in plastic so you don't get bits of styrofoam everywhere when unpacking, indicate good quality. The table and bench are solid wood and seem quite sturdy. Assembly of both was easy, things lined up as they should.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Love this table!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this table, I previously purchased the bench, then I saw the table and had to have it....then I saw that you can actually purchase the two benches and the table together as a set. LOL well I'll get a second bench eventually. Maybe the coffee table & end tables too. Exactly as pictured. Very easy to assemble, took less then 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Turtle30

customer_reviews.title: it showed up in great shape, the top is beautiful and it was ...
customer_reviews.text: Was nervous about ordering based on reviews but there was no stench, it showed up in great shape, the top is beautiful and it was easy to assemble. It really isn't a pure white, it is more of an off white or with a yellow or green tint than just white as one review pointed out. Couldn't beat the price for this, very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Barmaki

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Control Cracked Table Leg
customer_reviews.text: Was excited for my new table and it arrived quickly. Unfortunately there is company poor quality control. They actually sent a leg that was nicked and then repainted over. It looks so bad in real life. Then the opposite corner arrived cracked and the pieces of wood are still coming off. I'm going to have to live with the defects but not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Christina C.

customer_reviews.title: Quality product and quality presentation.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first review, I was compelled by the quality of the packaging, communication, and product. Zinus actually wraps the protective foam in thin plastic, which means you don't have a big mess of little chipped foam pieces to clean after assembly... a thoughtful touch. I also appreciated the card with good wishes for our new piece of furniture. Assembly was easy and the end product is very sturdy. The table is exactly what we needed for our small kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Giardini

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful table, sturdy and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I love this table. I put it together myself while keeping a 2 year old. I wanted to order a bigger size after already placing my order but after putting it together I realized it's perfect my needs. Very strong and beautiful. I don't have any rough spots as some have claimed. Mine is blemish free, as advertised. I love it
customer_reviews.author: sherridw42

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Cheap, decent table, realllly easy to assemble. Cons: Legs are definitely minty white rather than white-white. I bought some white paint at the store and used a sponge to paint. It looks fine now, but was a bit of a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: rbc8807

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: Hi guys! There are so many great things I like about this item: solid hard wood table top, sturdy legs, super easy to assemble and that's not an exaggeration - it's as simple as screwing in two bolts with the included 'L' wrench, per leg, nice rustic finish. The overall quality is excellent! Thank you for a great item.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: I was off on size
customer_reviews.text: It is great and durable I just didn’t pay attention to the size before I got it. We use these for our short term we taps and they have held up well to the wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Came with a crack
customer_reviews.text: The crack isn't too bad, but it is in the middle of a piece of wood on the bottom. I already has the table all together before I noticed the crack or else I would have sent it back. All in all, it's a nice table. Now to find chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: I love it. It is finished with some shine
customer_reviews.text: I bought my table in August. I love it. It is finished with some shine. It makes it very easy to clean, things just slide off. I would recommend putting a glass on top of it, because sometimes food or flour gets into the groves. I am using it by my bay window in my kitchen. I paired it with two Orange color chairs and put couple orange pillows in the bay window. They go well with the table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely AWESOME table!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am REALLY impressed by this table! From the packaging not only being good enough to protect it during shipping, but it also has plastic wrap covering each styrofoam piece so it doesn't break all over your floor. They also include a generic Allen wrench and a nice ratcheting Allen wrench to hold on to for tightening in the future. The quality and ease for assembly was so surprising, especially at this price. Will definitely buy more from this manufacturer in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Maximilian's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Great table, definitely worthwhile purchase
customer_reviews.text: - Came with great packaging, very protected, they even had plastic over the styrofoam so the styrofoam didn't break in the box - Very easy to put together, all you have to do is put the legs on the table - Very beautiful product - I am extremely happy with this product, have had quite a few issues with a few other amazon furniture purchases but this product was amazing and had no issues
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Six stars if I could!!
customer_reviews.text: The packaging of this table (and the matching bench, which I also bought) was beyond thoughtful; the styrofoam was all wrapped in plastic, so that it didn't crumble all over the place when unpacking, and they even included a TORQUE ALLEN WRENCH to tighten the screws. Literally, everything I ever wanted when unboxing a piece of furniture. On top of that, the piece itself is solid, attractive, and very well made; exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: savvy

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction and Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: We were very impressed with the craftsmanship that went into this table. It is solid and very attractive. Assembly was a breeze. Having assembled many pieces of furniture from another "well known" inexpensive furniture seller, I was amazed at how well packed and organized this was. In addition, assembling it took less than ten minutes. A real plus was a nice little rachet tool that made screwing in the bolts a snap.
customer_reviews.author: hcbet

customer_reviews.title: Great table!
customer_reviews.text: This table is awesome! We use it as a computer table and when we opened the box, we were so impressed with the quality of everything. Even the packaging was amazing! The wood is sturdy and great quality! We are happy with the purchase and recommend to anyone needing a “smaller” table.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nicely crafted , sturdy , easily assembled, well packaged , arrived day early, very beautiful table.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M.

customer_reviews.title: Great little table
customer_reviews.text: A perfect little table for my small kitchen. Light weight, good quality and love how it looks! We have 4 chairs comfortably around it and eat dinner at it. If you are on the fence I say buy it. The price is right and the quality is better than expected
customer_reviews.author: ChicagoBoho

customer_reviews.title: Best ever!
customer_reviews.text: This item is not only well made, it came in very well thought out packaging! I have never received or seen any packaging like this in my almost 70 years on the planet. Congratulations to Zinus Farmhouse for the quality and care you put into your product. If I could give this company 100 stars, I would! Par excellence!
customer_reviews.author: LindaJC

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Delivered early and in good condition. Easy to assemble and looks great in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Nice table
customer_reviews.text: I just received my table and pulled it out of the box. The only assembly required was to attach the legs. It took me 10 minutes to get this table together. The table came with extra parts so I had everything I needed. I also seem sturdy. I'm happy with my order.
customer_reviews.author: January Joy Huckins

customer_reviews.title: Great at this price
customer_reviews.text: The table is really easy to assemble, and looks much better than you would expect for this price. It is incredibly sturdy and has held up very well so far. The legs are cream, which seems like a little bit of a strange choice, but depending on the light, it usually isn't noticeable. Especially for this price, I consider this one to have been a very good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SMT

customer_reviews.title: A Zinus must buy & must have!
customer_reviews.text: Five-star table...super rustic...farmhouse feel...brilliantly made...sturdy wood construction...easy setup...need I say more? Zinus makes quality products for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy from this company again
customer_reviews.text: This table looks great, nice top.Went together easy, comes with a ratchet to assemble. Packing was impressive. Well thought out. Very sturdy, perfect for a smallish kitchen table. Paired it with black & wood windsor chairs. Nice .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The table is solid and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Such a solid, sturdy table, perfect for a small dining area. Four chairs fit perfectly. Super easy to assemble! Packaged perfectly to protect the parts for shipping and easy to remove packaging. I couldn't be more pleased with this purchase overall...and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie

customer_reviews.title: Love this table, perfect for eating and sturdy enough to use my sewing machine .
customer_reviews.text: This table is the perfect size for an apartment. Very sturdy. Easy to assemble. I was worried about cleaning crumbs out of the grooves in the top of the table, but the grooves are wide enough that crumbs don't get stuck. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Very well made.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great small space table. Very sturdy. Packaged extremely well! Very well made. I love this brand. If you are thinking of purchasing this table, do not hesitate. All you have to assemble, are the legs. So simple.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny South

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I literally just finished putting this table together and rushed to write this because I am SO impressed! Packaging was professional and clean and the table was well protected. Instructions were straight forward and assembly was so ridiculously simple. It's the perfect table for a small apartment and I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Lifsey

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: The table is unfinished on the top and not properly sanded. I am not sure why anybody would want an unfinished table, any food or spills could damage the table and you cannot place any glasses down without a coaster. DO NOT BUY unless you plan on finishing it yourself. I will now need to go out and buy a coating for the wood so it does not get destroyed by the first dinner I eat on it.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sewing table
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly, did it myself in 30 minutes from opening box to setting it in place. This table is exceptionally well packaged. Parts are boxed and clearly marked, a few extra parts included. I have a heavy duty Singer sewing machine and this table is solid and sturdy enough to support sewing without wobble and vibration. Excellent investment.
customer_reviews.author: Night Owl

customer_reviews.title: Good price bad finish
customer_reviews.text: Tood bad that the finish was poor and would've given us infinite splinters. Rough to the touch and would have been very difficult to clean and possibly hurtful. Had to return. Felt sturdy and was a good price though.
customer_reviews.author: lalaorganic

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful small table
customer_reviews.text: Arrived next day, super fast Prime delivery. Table was brought in the house, unboxed, and assembled in 20 min. It's in beautiful shape, nice rustic, solid wood appearance. All in all a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: pataks

customer_reviews.title: Super cute! I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you! I love this table! We have a small apartment and this table is perfect for it. The best part is that the table top color matches the chairs I already had, so major bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Patterson

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect for a small kitchen
customer_reviews.text: It's very well made and it's nice and sturdy as a matter of fact I'm using it right now to write this review, it's so easy to assemble a caveman can do it lol
customer_reviews.author: James Welsh

customer_reviews.title: Super
customer_reviews.text: Put it together this morning. Super protection and the foam pieces for protection were wrapped in cellophane. Just the right size for me. good price as well
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Ernst

customer_reviews.title: Super cute table
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute table! It shipped fast, was easy to put together, and seems sturdy. I ordered it to fit over my large dog crate, and for a space to keep the cat food where the dogs can't reach. Worked out great!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very well
customer_reviews.text: We really liked this table from the first day we received it. It came in a perfectly decorated box. They have thought everything to make it arrive to the customers without any problem. When we opened it, we realized most part were already assembled. They have sent possible substitute screws too. Everything you need for assembly and even more is included in the box. It took just like 5 mins to finish everything. We love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nilgun Sir

customer_reviews.title: In love with this table
customer_reviews.text: Moved to a different city for medical school. I love the design of this table as well as the quality! It is very sturdy and its overall look goes well with my very boring kitchen. It has become my fav study spot. Putting it together is very easy. They even included a semi-automatic allen wrench ( i have no clue in how to call it) that shortens the labor time. Keep in mind that the surface is a bit rough, I personally have no issue with it.
customer_reviews.author: bao

customer_reviews.title: Table top comes apart
customer_reviews.text: This table assembled easily and I loved it for the first 2 days until the finish on the table top started to come off!! Yes, chunks of the finish have come off. I have also gotten splinters when I clean it. It is so new that I don’t have the chairs yet and I have to figure out how to dispose of it and what new table to get. I love my Zinus mattress but this table is no good.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Sikora

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: Loved this table Looks great. Wanted to buy another one but dissapointed in seeing that the price went up from $74 to $140, smh. It was good while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Scorpio

customer_reviews.title: Cute table, very sturdy but
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it 5 stars but the top is not in the greatest shape. It's really rough with a washboard pattern and has slivers. I think it's a good table but I will have to refinish the top.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This table is perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: I use the table for my laptop and for doing puzzles. It is very well made, and sturdy. For the price, it is just what I had hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen Haines

customer_reviews.title: Great little table and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Great little table and looks great. I only took off 1 star because it is annoying to clean. Once crumbs get into the grooves of the top of the table you’ll need a hand vac to get them out. The color of the legs are an antique white color with a very suttle hint if mint green (I’m fine with it, but you may not be).
customer_reviews.author: Erika and Richie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect table for 4 - and such a steal for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This table is amazing! It looks even better in person. The only thing is it is a little wobbly. It’s really not noticeable and it’s very likely I just didn’t tighten the legs enough. I’m very impressed with this purchase and would definitely buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality. Sturdy. Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: This table is perfect for a small space! Very sturdy and takes maybe 15min to assemble. Very strong wood and quality!! Rustic farmhouse design.
customer_reviews.author: Kerilina

customer_reviews.title: Good little table for the money
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Sturdy, attractive, the smaller size was what I wanted. Only little problem is that it has rough patches as if it were distressed, which catch on paper wipes and such. However, that was helped with a furniture polish oil and should get worn down in time.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Don't even both If you have kids .
customer_reviews.text: Table has to be tighten often . The table stains so easily . After a month it looked like it was dirty all the time even with me cleaning it daily . I would not recommend unless you do not plan to use it .
customer_reviews.author: cassandra sicking

customer_reviews.title: SHIPPED WRONG COLOR
customer_reviews.text: This table is supposed to be a creamy paint color - I have the matching coffee table. However, what I received is WHITE! I am very unhappy!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Made me feel special with their extra touches
customer_reviews.text: I was so impressed. Best package job I’ve ever seen. ( styrofoam was wrapped in plastic. NO MESS) Not only did they include the sweetest ratchet to help with assembly they included an absolutely precious note thanking me for the purchase along with a few greeting cards to use for later All for the awesome price of $120 I am beyond happy
customer_reviews.author: diane oneal

customer_reviews.title: Great table for small space
customer_reviews.text: i have a small kitchen and needed a table that would fit just right. This table does, and looks great. My only complaint is the saw marks on part of the tabletop. I like a rustic look, but I think top could have been done a little better. I still like the table, and the price is right. It took a long time to receive it, which is not common.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rough splintery tabletop!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible :( the table top is so rough I’ve gotten two splinters from it already. Had I inspected the table top prior to assembly, I would have returned the table without question.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Jarige

customer_reviews.title: nice table, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: nice table, sturdy, meets my needs. I use it as a office desk. Smaller than I thought, but I have 2 big monitors and a laptop on the table, plus keyboard, and some small items, still very nice table
customer_reviews.author: skyworld

customer_reviews.title: Great table for a small apartment or studio.
customer_reviews.text: This table looks great in my small dining area! I wish it were a little bit bigger and a little more sturdy. The top is unfinished, which I like, but it does seem like you can easily get a splinter from it. Other then that, it’s awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, good value, takes about 5-10 minutes to screw together, less if you have your socket set handy.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron G

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Sturdy Table—Awesome Packaging
customer_reviews.text: I love this table and for the price, it was a real bargain. And, all the Styrofoam packing was surrounded by plastic wrap so you didn’t get all of the little white particles on your floor. Genius idea! I would absolutely buy from this company again because of the quality of the product, but also because of the packaging. It was awesome!
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Fit the Descriotion
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly wanted. Very stable table. Easy to put together. Well made
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the sturdiness and appearance of this table. It was easy to put together, and looks even better than I expected - especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Chris S.

customer_reviews.title: Cute table for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: Cute little table for our small kitchen. Packaging was very thoughtful and meticulous. Sturdy little table for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Ella C.M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice table for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice table. Nicer than picture. One thing is, while it's sturdy, it's light..easy to move, especially when getting up or down
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Gaskil

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very well constructed and pretty table. Well worth the money. It was very easy to assemble, and all the hardware was very well labeled. Great price and great quality. They even include a few blank greeting cards with the table, which I thought was really sweet!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Millet

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small kitchen or nook - def would purchase again!
customer_reviews.text: Love! Sturdy, easy assembly, solid wood ... first piece I purchased from Zinus, second was the bench ... the table legs and brace under the top have a faint mint tone to the color vs the white of the bench legs but I like the slight contrast. I purchased the table and one bench separately so I would suggest buying together as it saves a little $. Also the bench top does not have the scoring in the wood like the table so if you’re very into complete matching, consider that. I, however, love both purchases!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Stack

customer_reviews.title: Found it as advertised💥
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Functional and attractive. Good buy all around
customer_reviews.author: pinta

customer_reviews.title: 15 Minute Set Up
customer_reviews.text: What a great buy! Sturdy, seems to be durable and most of all gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this table. Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Kimmel

customer_reviews.title: Solid and pretty
customer_reviews.text: This is a surprisingly nice table. I don’t go out of the way to buy nice things, so I replace cheap tables from time to time. This one is actually pretty solid and the texture of the top is unique. Great for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Williams000

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful table, easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this table. It was so easy to assemble and it's great for small spaces. We fit 4 people comfortably and have fit 5 when needed. It's a beautiful farmhouse style and I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kyndall

customer_reviews.title: ... giving this small table a 5 as it was super easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving this small table a 5 as it was super easy to put together. The packaging assured there were no scratches. It’s the perfect size for my nook. Beautiful as well.
customer_reviews.author: Susan’s Reads

customer_reviews.title: it's a good quality. It's not heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it's a good quality. It's not heavy duty, but I feel it's great for what you pay for. We only seat two seats with it and I'm sure it would work with 4, just might be a little tight.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this table! We wanted something smaller, durable and yet still be our farmhouse style and this was the perfect choice! We paired it with teal metal farmhouse chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Michalaks

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautifully designed table
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautifully designed table. Real wood. Strong and sturdy. A very slight tint of green (not pure white) are the legs. Giving it a more rustic touch. The top is not a light wood finish. As the photo shows. It is darker (but again) this gives it a beautiful rustic look. I love it. Very easy to assemble. Worth the full price.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Yezierskis

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what i thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: I really needed a smaller kitchen table for my small kitchen. This came exactly as pictured. It was packaged so well, no scratched or dents. I love it and it is so beautiful in person!
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: Great for small spaces. Easy to assemble. Surface top wood is a tiny bit rough instead of smooth and shiny but not enough to bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent in every way
customer_reviews.text: I have two tables from this company zinus. I highly recommend them! Quality wood, easy to assemble with 8 bolts, 2 on each leg, very sturdy and stable, fast shipping, excellent packing. The white on this one is slightly yellowish in tone but it does not look bad in a cream room. Would not look good with pure white decor though. The wood on the top is lovely and genuine wood. The height is perfect for eating and doing projects. It makes a great sewing table for me. Fits into any little nook, but be sure to measure your space.
customer_reviews.author: CountryMom

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time, is just as it shows in ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, is just as it shows in the picture. Mine doesn't have the smell other reviewers have noted. Wasn't stable at first (rocked a little) but after a a couple hours it had evened itself out.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Craft/Sewing desk
customer_reviews.text: Great deal! So much space for sewing, crafting and drawing. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jonel Neely

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully packaged, easy to assemble (I’m a 79 year old great grandma), sturdy and good looking. Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: K. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Would be better without the grooves
customer_reviews.text: The top surface is rough, has a few black colored natural spots, has grooves. But it is strong and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: blueberry

customer_reviews.title: Beautifull table
customer_reviews.text: A great looking table! Table is located in the kitchen nook. I also added wheel's and moves very easily over are tile floor. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sturdy table which was also easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sturdy table which was also easy to put together. Instead of the usual tiny plastic bags with the nuts and bolts, etc., in them, the parts came in a small tray with very clear instructions. I will definitely order from Zinus again.
customer_reviews.author: Margo M Fisher

customer_reviews.title: the simplicity of its design is very nice, and it is comfortable to sit and eat ...
customer_reviews.text: While not an elegant table, the simplicity of its design is very nice, and it is comfortable to sit and eat at. It fits well in a small space.
customer_reviews.author: HB

product_meta.title: Zinus Becky Farmhouse Wood Dining Table / Table Only
product_meta.description: With painted legs and base and neutral wood tone surface the Zinus farmhouse dining table will add country style character to your kitchen. Easy to assemble in minutes with sturdy wood construction for durability and long lasting use. Worry-free 1-year warranty.
feature_bullets: Two-tone painted pine wood for Country style Charm
Table only/ does not include chairs

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars449 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
